Software Consulting for Founders

Corewood Systems Thinking. · Software Building.

Corewood builds AI systems, geospatial platforms, and security architecture for founders who need production-grade from day one.

Schedule a Consultation

“Your RAG system doesn’t know who’s asking.”

Most RAG implementations are open pipes — dump documents, embed, retrieve, prompt. No one checks whether the person asking should see the answer.

Corewood builds policy-enforced retrieval where authorization is evaluated at query time, not ingestion. Graph-driven access control, self-hosted inference, sub-millisecond auth decisions powered by OPA.

Your LLM never sees data the user shouldn’t.

“Your location data is trapped in legacy tools.”

GIS platforms were built for researchers, not products. If your app needs maps, terrain, or spatial queries — you’re fighting tools that weren’t designed for what you’re building.

Corewood builds geospatial systems that ship as product features, not science projects.

Go-native spatial processing. No PostGIS or Python in your data plane.

“You’ll land an enterprise customer. Will your auth survive?”

Most startups skip identity architecture. Then a big customer asks for SSO, SCIM provisioning, and an audit trail. Suddenly it’s a 6-month rewrite.

Corewood builds enterprise auth from day one — OIDC, SAML, mTLS, policy-as-code with OPA. It starts simple and scales without a rewrite.

Hundreds of thousands of IoT devices authenticated via custom mTLS CA.

How we work

Free consultation (30 min) — We talk through your situation and pain points. No commitment, just fit.

If we’re aligned, we move to discovery — scoping the engagement, defining requirements, and determining whether you need a project or ongoing support.

How we help

Project — Scoped work, fixed price, clear handoff. You own everything we build.

Retainer — Ongoing access for architecture decisions, code review, team support, and the problems that come up at 2am.

Pricing

Discovery starts at $120/hour for expert-level consultation. Project and retainer pricing is scoped from discovery.

Climate tech and nonprofits get preferred pricing.

Limited engagements per quarter.

Open Source by Corewood

We open-sourced the architecture we use for every client engagement.

A reference architecture for LLM-driven engineering. Four layers, one direction, every module the same shape. Clone it, learn from it, or hire us to build yours.

Building software is the most expensive way to discover your requirements.
